title: Morrissey Announces 2025 US Tour
description: The former Smiths frontman will hit 12 cities across the United States in April and May. Morrissey Announces 2025 US Tour Jonah Krueger
author: Jonah Krueger
excerpt: Morrissey has announced a new 2025 United States tour, which sees the former Smiths frontman hitting 12 cities in April and May. See the dates.
text: Morrissey has announced plans for a new 2025 US tour, following up his sold-out run of shows in late 2024. Kicking off on April 26th in Reno, Nevada, the former Smiths frontman will then perform in cities like San Diego, Tucson, Oklahoma City, and Atlanta. Ultimately, he’ll wrap up the run in Hollywood, Florida, on May 17th. See the full list of Morrissey’s 2025 tour dates below. Get Morrissey Tickets Here A Live Nation pre-sale kicks off on Thursday, February 6th for select dates via Ticketmaster (use code DUET). The general on-sale will follow on Friday, February 7th via Ticketmaster. Once tickets are on sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. Morrissey’s most recent solo album is 2020’s I Am Not a Dog on a Chain. He reportedly has new music ready, including his shelved album Bonfire of Teenagers, but claims  that “nobody” will release it due to the war on “free speech” in England. Morrissey 2025 Tour Dates: 04/26 – Reno, NV @ Grand Theatre at Grand Sierra Resort 04/28 – Fresno, CA @ Warnors Center for the Performing Arts 04/30 – Bakersfield, CA @ The Historic Fox Theatre Bakersfield 05/01 – San Diego, CA @ San Diego Civic Theatre 05/03 – Rancho Mirage, CA @ The Show at Agua Caliente Resort Casino Spa Rancho Mirage 05/05 – Tucson, AZ @ Centennial Hall 05/08 – San Antonio, TX @ Boeing Center at Tech Port 05/10 – Oklahoma City, OK @ The Criterion 05/12 – St. Louis, MO @ The Factory 05/14 – Atlanta, GA @ Fox Theatre 05/16 – St. Petersburg, FL @ Duke Energy Center for the Arts – Mahaffey Theater 05/17 – Hollywood, FL @ Hard Rock Live at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino
html:
Morrissey has announced plans for a new 2025 US tour, following up his sold-out run of shows in late 2024.

Kicking off on April 26th in Reno, Nevada, the former Smiths frontman will then perform in cities like San Diego, Tucson, Oklahoma City, and Atlanta. Ultimately, he’ll wrap up the run in Hollywood, Florida, on May 17th. See the full list of Morrissey’s 2025 tour dates below.

Get Morrissey Tickets Here

A Live Nation pre-sale kicks off on Thursday, February 6th for select dates via Ticketmaster (use code DUET). The general on-sale will follow on Friday, February 7th via Ticketmaster. Once tickets are on sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program.

Morrissey’s most recent solo album is 2020’s I Am Not a Dog on a Chain. He reportedly has new music ready, including his shelved album Bonfire of Teenagers, but claims  that “nobody” will release it due to the war on “free speech” in England.

Morrissey 2025 Tour Dates:
04/26 – Reno, NV @ Grand Theatre at Grand Sierra Resort
04/28 – Fresno, CA @ Warnors Center for the Performing Arts
04/30 – Bakersfield, CA @ The Historic Fox Theatre Bakersfield
05/01 – San Diego, CA @ San Diego Civic Theatre
05/03 – Rancho Mirage, CA @ The Show at Agua Caliente Resort Casino Spa Rancho Mirage
05/05 – Tucson, AZ @ Centennial Hall
05/08 – San Antonio, TX @ Boeing Center at Tech Port
05/10 – Oklahoma City, OK @ The Criterion
05/12 – St. Louis, MO @ The Factory
05/14 – Atlanta, GA @ Fox Theatre
05/16 – St. Petersburg, FL @ Duke Energy Center for the Arts – Mahaffey Theater
05/17 – Hollywood, FL @ Hard Rock Live at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino
